description: Demolition of existing building and erection of a part 2, 4 and 6 storey building with basement to provide 60 residential flats (13x1, 36x2, 8x3, 2x4 and 1x5 beds) and 2915sq.m. (GIA) Business (Use Class B1), with 2 disabled parking spaces, 72 cycle storage spaces and associated on-site servicing and sub-station.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The application for the approval of reserved matters must be made to the Local Planning Authority no later than the expiry of three (3) years beginning with the date of this outline planning consent and the development to which the permission relates must be begun no later than the expiration of two (2) years from the final approval of the reserved matters, or in the case of approval on different dates, the final approval of the last such matter approved. 

REASON: To comply with Section 92(2) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by Section 51(2) of the Planning Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.
